Subskills.name: Pentagram Radius
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of demon's calling.

Subskills.name: Demon's Embrace
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by demon's calling.

Subskills.name: Unholy Aftershock
Subskills.description: Demon's Calling now echoes additional times increasing its size.

Subskills.name: Hellflame Burst
Subskills.description: Chance to send monsters airborne on hit causing them to deal area of effect damage when landing.

Subskills.name: Dark Essence
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: Dark Meteors
Subskills.description: Chance to drop chaos meteors on hit dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: The Fiery Layer of Hell
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Hellish Scorching
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to burning targets.

Subskills.name: Pentagram Shockwave
Subskills.description: Unleash a shockwave of pentagrams dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Demon's Mind
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to jump higher and smash the ground dealing increased damage with increased area of effect radius.

Subskills.name: Devil in the Detail
Subskills.description: Decreases mana cost when using demon's calling.

Subskills.name: Hell Infused Aftershock
Subskills.description: Chance to shock the ground an additional time.

Subskills.name: Shadow Flames
Subskills.description: Dark meteors now unleash a trail of shadow flames outwards dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Appearing from Shadows
Subskills.description: Blink towards target location before unleashing demons calling with increased damage.
